definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: Great Man-wide preparations for Hsu stole the money donated to the church.
sentences.chinese: 大寬偷走了許曼準備捐給教堂的錢。

sentences.english: He inspected the archives shortly after Dr. Brenner donated them to Cold Spring Harbor.
sentences.chinese: 伯納德博士把文檔捐給冷泉港之後不久他做了檢測。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, the latter contributed less to charity.
sentences.chinese: 不出意料，後者捐給慈善機構的錢少一些。

sentences.english: I gave a ten-dollar contribution to the church every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我每個週日捐給教堂十美元。

sentences.english: At the end of the month, I’ll take the money I saved and donate it to Kiva.org.
sentences.chinese: 月底的時候，我會把省下來的錢捐給基瓦組織。

sentences.english: Donate extra clothes and furniture to friends, or even better, the Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 多餘的衣服和傢俱，捐給朋友，或者捐給救世軍更好。

sentences.english: Donate extra clothes and furniture to friends, or even better, the Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 多餘的衣服和傢俱，捐給朋友，或者捐給救世軍更好。

sentences.english: The proceeds from the coffee sales will go to charity.
sentences.chinese: “貓糞”咖啡的銷售收入將捐給慈善機構。

sentences.english: And I would definitely donate money to the poor people.
sentences.chinese: 我也會把錢捐給那些貧苦的人。

sentences.english: A lot of money has been donated to Project Green Hope.
sentences.chinese: 許多錢已捐給綠色希望工程。

sentences.english: A proportion of those auction proceeds would go to developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 那些拍賣收益的一部分將捐給發展中國家。

sentences.english: It is generous of him to donate all his money to the orphan's home.
sentences.chinese: 他將他所有的錢都捐給了孤兒院，真是慷慨之致。

sentences.english: Pledges $50 billion upon his death to Gates Foundation.
sentences.chinese: 認捐500億美元，死後捐給蓋茨基金會。

sentences.english: And so, he gave this painting to the National Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 因此他把這幅畫捐給了英國國家美術館。

sentences.english: He spent all his large fortune on endowing a hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他把龐大的家產全部捐給了一家醫院。

sentences.english: They dispensed the money to charity.
sentences.chinese: 他們把錢捐給慈善事業。
